text: 570IPGEncapsulation using ASPENSDI-CH1Video (SMPTE RDD37)-CH1Audio (SMPTE 302M)-CH1Metadata (SMPTE 2038)-CH1Video (SMPTE RDD37)-CH2Audio (SMPTE 302M)-CH2Metadata (SMPTE 2038)-CH2SDI-CH2EXE ROUTER10GigEAudio Processing570EMR-AG-HUB570EMR-FK-ADMXEMR-IO8-MADIMultiviewers10GigETDM10GigEDedicated Multicast IP Stream239.1.1.1Dedicated Multicast IP Stream239.1.1.2Dedicated Multicast IP Stream239.1.1.3AUDIO ROUTING IN ASPENSDI-CH1SDI-CH2TDM10GigE8 xMADI8 xMADIEMR-IO8-MADI8 xMADI8 xMADITDMTDM570 or S570 FrameEMX 1, 3 or 6 FrameAn audio gateway for TDM Audio to IP Audio, supporting existing TDM modules and AES67 to 302M, with an optional licence '570EMR-FK-ADMX' that will allow for any audio to any audio mono shuffling. Physically the module supports 8x8 TDM and 10GE for IP Audio.
